verses.verse: Yet <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> you, and <S%H3335>formed<s%> you from the <S%H990>womb,<s%> which will <S%H5826>help<s%> you; <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not, O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and you, <S%H3484>Jesurun,<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>

For I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> on him that is <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> and <S%H5140>floods<s%> on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> ground: I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> on your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on your <S%H6631>offspring:<s%>
And they shall <S%H6779>spring<s%> up as <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2682>grass,<s%> as <S%H6155>willows<s%> by the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2988>courses.<s%>

One shall <S%H559>say,<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD's;<s%> and <S%H2088>another<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and <S%H2088>another<s%> shall <S%H3789>subscribe<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3655>surname<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> I am the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and I am the <S%H314>last;<s%> and <S%H1107>beside<s%> me there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H4310>who,<s%> as I, shall <S%H7121>call,<s%> and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> it, and set it in <S%H6186>order<s%> for me, since I <S%H7760>appointed<s%> the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> and the things that are <S%H857>coming,<s%> and shall <S%H935>come,<s%> let them <S%H5046>show<s%> to them.

<S%H6342>Fear<s%> you not, <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H7297>afraid:<s%> have not I <S%H8085>told<s%> you from that <S%H227>time,<s%> and have <S%H5046>declared<s%> it? you are even my <S%H5707>witnesses.<s%> Is there a <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> me? yes, there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6697>God;<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> not any.

They that <S%H3335>make<s%> a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image are <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H8414>vanity;<s%> and their <S%H2530>delectable<s%> things shall not <S%H3276>profit;<s%> and they are their own <S%H5707>witnesses;<s%> they <S%H7200>see<s%> not, <S%H1077>nor<s%> <S%H3045>know;<s%> that they may be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H3335>formed<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> or <S%H5258>molten<s%> a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image that is <S%H3276>profitable<s%> for <S%H1115>nothing?<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2270>fellows<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> and the <S%H2796>workmen,<s%> they are of <S%H120>men:<s%> let them <S%H3605>all<s%> be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together, let them <S%H5975>stand<s%> up; yet they shall <S%H6342>fear,<s%> and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H2796>smith<s%> <S%H1270><s%> with the <S%H4621>tongs<s%> both <S%H6466>works<s%> in the <S%H6352>coals,<s%> and <S%H3335>fashions<s%> it with <S%H4717>hammers,<s%> and <S%H6466>works<s%> it with the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of his <S%H2220>arms:<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> he is <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H369>fails:<s%> he <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and is <S%H3286>faint.<s%>

The <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> <S%H6086><s%> <S%H5186>stretches<s%> out his <S%H6957>rule;<s%> he <S%H8388>marks<s%> it out with a <S%H8279>line;<s%> he <S%H6213>fits<s%> it with <S%H4741>planes,<s%> and he <S%H8388>marks<s%> it out with the <S%H4230>compass,<s%> and <S%H6213>makes<s%> it after the <S%H8403>figure<s%> of a <S%H376>man,<s%> according to the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of a <S%H120>man;<s%> that it may <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He <S%H3772>hews<s%> him down <S%H730>cedars,<s%> and <S%H3947>takes<s%> the <S%H8645>cypress<s%> and the <S%H437>oak,<s%> which he <S%H553>strengthens<s%> for himself among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest:<s%> he <S%H5195>plants<s%> an <S%H766>ash,<s%> and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> does <S%H1431>nourish<s%> it.

Then shall it be for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1197>burn:<s%> for he will <S%H3947>take<s%> thereof, and <S%H2552>warm<s%> himself; <S%H637>yes,<s%> he <S%H5400>kindles<s%> it, and <S%H644>bakes<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> he <S%H6466>makes<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> and <S%H7812>worships<s%> it; he <S%H6213>makes<s%> it a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, and <S%H5456>falls<s%> <S%H5456>down<s%> thereto.

He <S%H8313>burns<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> with <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof he <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> he <S%H6740>roasts<s%> <S%H6748>roast,<s%> and is <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> he <S%H2552>warms<s%> himself, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H253>Aha,<s%> I am <S%H2552>warm,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H217>fire:<s%>

And the <S%H7611>residue<s%> thereof he <S%H6213>makes<s%> a <S%H410>god,<s%> even his <S%H6459>graven<s%> image: he <S%H5456>falls<s%> <S%H5456>down<s%> to it, and <S%H7812>worships<s%> it, and <S%H6419>prays<s%> to it, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me; for you are my <S%H410>god.<s%>

They have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H995>understood:<s%> for he has <S%H2902>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that they cannot <S%H7200>see;<s%> and their <S%H3826>hearts,<s%> that they cannot <S%H7919>understand.<s%>

And <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H7725>considers<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> I have <S%H8314>burned<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it in the <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> I have <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on the <S%H1513>coals<s%> thereof; I have <S%H6740>roasted<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H398>eaten<s%> it: and shall I <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> thereof an <S%H8441>abomination?<s%> shall I <S%H5456>fall<s%> <S%H5456>down<s%> to the <S%H944>stock<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree?<s%>

He <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H665>ashes:<s%> a <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> has <S%H5186>turned<s%> him <S%H5186>aside,<s%> that he <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> Is there not a <S%H3576>lie<s%> in my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand?<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for you are my <S%H5650>servant:<s%> I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> you; you are my <S%H5650>servant:<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you shall not be <S%H5382>forgotten<s%> of me.

I have <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out, as a thick <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> your <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> and, as a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> your <S%H2403>sins:<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to me; for I have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> you.

<S%H7442>Sing,<s%> O you <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> it: <S%H7321>shout,<s%> you <S%H8482>lower<s%> parts of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H6476>break<s%> forth into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> you <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> O <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> therein: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H6286>glorified<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> your <S%H1350>redeemer,<s%> and he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> you from the <S%H990>womb,<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things; that <S%H5186>stretches<s%> forth the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> that <S%H7554>spreads<s%> <S%H7554>abroad<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by myself;

That <S%H6565>frustrates<s%> the <S%H226>tokens<s%> of the <S%H907>liars,<s%> and makes <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H1984>mad;<s%> that <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men <S%H268>backward,<s%> and makes their <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H5528>foolish;<s%>

That <S%H6965>confirms<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H7999>performes<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of his <S%H4397>messengers;<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> You shall be <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> and to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> You shall be <S%H1129>built,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> up the <S%H2723>decayed<s%> places thereof:
That <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H6683>deep,<s%> Be <S%H2717>dry,<s%> and I will <S%H3001>dry<s%> up your <S%H5103>rivers:<s%>

That <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus,<s%> He is my <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and shall <S%H7999>perform<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2656>pleasure:<s%> even <S%H559>saying<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> You shall be <S%H1129>built;<s%> and to the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> Your <S%H3245>foundation<s%> shall be laid.
